reporter_caption.center: PECK HILLS FURNITURE CO. v. LORENZEN, 238 Ill. App. 632 (1925)

caption.center: Peck Hills Furniture Company, appellee, v. Charles F. Lorenzen,

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture:
Action upon a stated account. Judgment for plaintiff.
Appeal from the Municipal Court of Chicago; the Hon. Daniel P. Trude. Judge, presiding. Heard in the second division of this court for the first district at the March term, 1925.
opinion.attorneys: J. Kendall Mitchell, for appellant. Harper E. Osborn, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Presiding Justice Barnes delivered the opinion of the court.
